summary: The history of traffic safety educational films and their notoriously lurid content.
cast: Richard Anderson|Sonny Bono|John F. Butler|Hans Conried|Earle Deems|John R. Domer|David Krug|Eric Krug|Rick Prelinger|Ronald Reagan|Helena Reckitt|Robert F. Simon|James Stewart|Mike Vraney|James Waller|Bret Wood|Martin Yant|Dick York
title: Hell's Highway: The True Story of Highway Safety Films
